lines.text: Jeez, I sent you to cover a piece of fluff, and you come back with a hostage situation.
[Sam finally decide's to let the hostages go]

[on megaphone]
Sam Baily! You have 5 minutes to let the hostages go!
Damn. I wanted it to be my idea.
I think they'd want to know.
Mrs. Banks, go make sure the buffalo are grazing properly.
I'm who Americans trust for their news.
You really shouldn't let a marketing slogan go your head.
This guy's a poster child for the disenfranchised.
A man has been shot; a line has been crossed.
You've got to ask for a fast car, a Learjet or a Greyhound bus.
I don't want him understood. I want him out here and arrested.
